attributes.action: prevent the closures of the driving test centres in Colwyn Bay and Holyhead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DSA are planning on closing the driving test centres in Colwyn Bay and Holyhead. This means that new and inexperienced drivers will have to either drive or be driven at least 20 miles over difficult roads to be tested or for driving lessons. We petition the government to pressurise the DSA to rethink this move, as the lack of test centres will be an added expense for prospective students.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
